short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 该扩展程序由Shoptop技术团队研发，为Shoptop商户提供商品采集服务，支持商户多平台采集商品，采集后可同步到多个店铺。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
该扩展程序由Shoptop技术团队研发，为Shoptop商户提供商品采集服务，支持商户多平台采集商品，采集后可同步到多个店铺。

Developed by the Shoptop technical team，it provides product collecting services for Shoptop merchants, multi-platform product collecting is supported, and these products can be synchronized to multiple stores.
